      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract int getCoverage()
      Method for accessing exact coverage that we currently have for key space; returns number of hash slots that are covered by at least one node.
      abstract NodesForKey getNodesFor(K key)
      Method for finding set of nodes to contact for accessing content with specified key.
      abstract int getServerCount()
      Accessor for finding out number of server nodes cluster is known to have.

      Method that can be called to determine whether at least one node exists to access all keys of cluster's key space.

    • Method Detail

      • getServerCount

        public abstract int getServerCount()
        Accessor for finding out number of server nodes cluster is known to have.

      • isFullyAvailable

        public abstract boolean isFullyAvailable()
        Method that can be called to determine whether at least one node exists to access all keys of cluster's key space. Currently this accepts both active and passive ranges, as well as disabled nodes; mostly because method is called during bootstrapping when we are typically interested in possibility of everything being accessible.

      • getCoverage

        public abstract int getCoverage()
        Method for accessing exact coverage that we currently have for key space; returns number of hash slots that are covered by at least one node.

      • getNodesFor

        public abstract NodesForKey getNodesFor(K key)
        Method for finding set of nodes to contact for accessing content with specified key.
